```{r}
library(dplyr)

future_collection<-read_csv('all_commodities_futures_collection.csv')
```

```{r}

 ggplot(data = agricultural_collection,
       mapping = aes( x= low , y = high)) +
         geom_point(mapping = aes( color = category, shape = category)) +
         geom_smooth( method = "lm")+
         labs(title = "Future Commodies Movement",
           x = "Low", y = "High")
        
      
```


```{r}
agricultural_collection<-future_collection%>%
  filter( category == "agricultural commodities")

```



```{r}
future_collection%>%
  group_by(category)  %>%
  summarise(
    n = n(),
    volume = mean(volume, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  filter(
    n >1,
  )
```

```{r}
future_collection%>%
  filter(category == "fossil fuels", date>= 2022-01-01)



  
  arrange(desc(volume))%>%
  select(commodity,category,date, volume)
```
